message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be a valuable asset for you.  I'm asking for $14,500 to start.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13,000?

Hi Bob, I understand you're working within a budget. While I can't do $13,000, I could come down to $14,000. This is my best offer and I think it's a fair reflection of the value this product will bring you.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13,500?
